title: [Caffe2] Which document should we follow to install caffe2?
body_html:
There are at least TWO "official" documents for caffe2:
(1) https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source
(2) https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile

Which one should we follow?
As we noticed that there are lots of questions in building caffe2, it would be nice if there is an "official" way to do it other than multiple documents that are different from each other. Thanks.
